To measure BGB, It was used root-to-shoot ratio, which has become the standard method for estimating root biomass from the more easily measured shoot biomass. The equation developed by MacDicken (1997) to estimate belowground biomass was used. The equation is given below:
(4)BGB = AGB Ã— 0.2 (2) Where, BGB is below ground biomass, AGB is above ground biomass, 0.2 is conversion factor (or 20% of AGB).
